add.title: Terms of Employment (TEM054)
add.description: Form filled by the employer detailing the terms of work.

steps_flow.title: Secure Job Offer
steps_flow.description: Get a signed contract and the TEM054 form from your employer.

steps_flow.title: Apply on Enter Finland
steps_flow.description: Submit the application for 'Residence Permit for an Employed Person' online.

steps_flow.title: Employer Verification
steps_flow.description: Your employer logs in to Enter Finland to add their details to your application.

steps_flow.title: Book Appointment
steps_flow.description: Visit VFS Global for identity verification and biometrics.

steps_flow.title: TE Office Decision
steps_flow.description: The Employment Office (TE Office) makes a partial decision, then Migri makes the final decision.
